## isArrowFunction() function

判断函数是否是箭头函数

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isArrowFunction(fun: Function): boolean;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fun | Function | 被判断的函数 |
